summary: RayRetriever encapsulates the setup and execution of a Retrieval‑Augmented Generation (RAG) retriever using Ray for distributed processing. It initializes the retrieval backend, creates the RAG retriever object, and provides a method to perform document retrieval queries.
business_intent: Enable scalable, high‑performance document retrieval for AI applications such as chatbots or knowledge‑base assistants, leveraging Ray to handle large datasets and parallel queries.
